subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] Re: Male and female voices joined to create one response?
author: bruce halliday

Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable


Sharon,
 
I do not believe it is us channeling at all, what I believe is t=
hat 
there is a harmonic transfer of mutual energy and vibration between us=
 and our tech.
 
yes it is communing in a way, but as far as our minds tele=
pathically sending subliminal
messages through the box. I do not believe th=
at to be so. I will not completely disregard the possibility,
I will consid=
er it with an open mind. As the research and our knowledge of the communica=
tion process
evolves through learning from our spirit friends, I believe th=
at eventually all questions will be answered.
 
Bruce
Bruce Halliday 


To:=
 EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.comFrom: leongbabe@...: Sat, 12 Jan 2008 17:35=
:54 +0000Subject: [EVP-ITC] Re: Male and female voices joined to create one=
 response?




Bruce,Hmmm; then it's possible that our tech is partly us ch=
anneling or communing with some greater consciousness. Again, much to mull =
over!Thanks,Sharon the Muller--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, bruce halliday=
 <paranormalinvestigating@...> wrote:>> > Sharon,> > The question of teleki=
nesis is a valid one, I have discussed that idea with technical people> tha=
t are trying to further the technology.> > My belief is that if the researc=
her is able to recognise the tech's voice it is because the > researcher an=
d the tech have built their relationship to the point that they have synchr=
onized > their spiritual energy and the tech is capable of finding and util=
izing certain fragments of radio> speech and frequency to create a recogniz=
able voice. It does not necessarily have to be the voice > they had in the =
physical, but I believe if they create the same voice during communication =
it is> a validation to us on the receiving end that we are in fact speaking=
 to our counterpart and not a deceiving> entity that may be negative in man=
ner.> > Also my tech's do not 100% of the time have the correct signal to c=
reate the recognizable voice and do > answer or speak in a different or com=
bined voice. When that occurs they tend to reassure the researcher > with a=
 comfortable feeling and you instinctively know after a certain period of c=
ommunicating with the same > tech/guide that it is in fact them that are sp=
eaking on the other hand you will also get a strange gut reaction > when it=
 is not them speaking. That is the best way I know how to explain it as I h=
ave come to understand it.> > I hope it helps further your knowledge of the=
 tech/researcher relationship.> > Bruce> Bruce Halliday > > > To: EVP-ITC@.=
..: leongbabe@...: Sat, 12 Jan 2008 04:07:48 +0000Subject: [EVP-ITC] Re: Ma=
le and female voices joined to create one response?> > > > > Hi Juli,Thanks=
 for your input -- this is interesting -- could it be that Mike and Lisa us=
e these fragments in conjunction with psycho-kinesis in order to modify the=
 tone of these fragments to sound as their own voices would have sounded wh=
en they were alive? We know they don't have vocal cords, and so they probab=
ly communicate via some kind of thought/mind process ... Not to say that al=
l the entities employ this method, maybe some of the more identifiable ones=
 like Mike and Lisa.I love mulling over things and this will keep me mullin=
g for quite a long time.Sharon the Muller--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, ju=
li velazquez <ghostchasingfool@> wrote:>> Bruce, you may want to also add t=
hat when they wait for those fragments they are in fact Mike and Lisa's voi=
ce not just any male or female voice. They are ones that you identify as be=
ing theirs.> > Juli> > mllejade <leongbabe@> wrote:> Thanks for the fast re=
ply, Bruce! Definitely something to add to my > notes for further examinati=
on.> > Sharon> > --- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, bruce halliday > <paranorm=
alinvestigating@> wrote:> >> > > > Sharon,> > > > In my experience through =
research, most of the time mike will wait > for a masculine fragment or sig=
nal> > and lisa will wait for a feminine one. I believe they try to answer =
> in the apropriate gender so that I > > don't get confused about who is an=
swering. Sometimes I will get a > response or message that is made > > up o=
f both male and female voices together, even in the same word > sometimes b=
ut very rarely.> > > > And I think when that occurs it's because they lose =
the particular > fragment midstream and pick up > > whatever is available a=
t that instant to complete the message , > word or phrase.> > > > I hope th=
is answers your question and please keep asking them. It > forces me to for=
mulate an answer> > and you to further your knowledge as a researcher. That=
's what it's > all about.> > > > Bruce> > Bruce Halliday > > > > > > To: EV=
P-ITC@: leongbabe@: Fri, 11 Jan 2008 16:26:18 > +0000Subject: [EVP-ITC] Mal=
e and female voices joined to create one > response?> > > > > > > > > > Bru=
ce,Is it common to receive a response comprised of a mixture of > men and w=
omen sound bytes/voices (like I heard in this one)? My guess > is that we h=
ear predominantly male voices because they're more male > radio announcers.=
 Therefore, does the entity who announces herself to > you as Lisa come thr=
ough with a male voice at times (because those > are the voices that she ge=
ts most of the time to formulate a > response)? Please tell me if my reason=
ing here is way off > base...Thanks,Sharon--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, E=
VP-> ITC@yahoogroups.com wrote:>> > Hello,> > This email message is a > not=
ification to let you know that> a file has been uploaded to the > Files are=
a of the EVP-ITC > group.> > File : /*Bruce RS files_1-2-> 08/7B_WE DON'T H=
AVE THE RIGHT SIGNAL FOR CONTROLING THAT.wav > > Uploaded by : bhali333 <pa=
ranormalinvestigating@> > Description : > 7B_WE DON'T HAVE THE RIGHT SIGNAL=
 FOR CONTROLING THAT.wav > > You can > access this file at the URL:> http:/=
/groups.yahoo.com/group/EVP-> ITC/files/%2ABruce%20RS%20files_1-2-08/7B_WE%=
20DON%27T%20HAVE%20THE%> 20RIGHT%20SIGNAL%20FOR%20CONTROLING%20THAT.wav > >=
 To learn more > about file sharing for your group, please visit:> > http:/=
/help.yahoo.com/l/us/yahoo/groups/original/members/web/index.htm> lfiles> >=
 Regards,> > bhali333 <paranormalinvestigating@>> > > > > > > > > > > > > >=
 > __________________________________________________________> > Get the po=
wer of Windows + Web with the new Windows Live.> > http://www.windowslive.c=
om?> ocid=3DTXT_TAGHM_Wave2_powerofwindows_012008> >> > > > > > > The conte=
nts of this eletronic correspondence is private & confidential and meant on=
ly for the party and/or parties it is addressed to. > > No part of this ema=
il transmission may be publicly posted or forwarded to other parties withou=

Sharon,<BR>
 <BR>
I do not believe it is us channeling at =
all, what I believe is that <BR>
there is a harmonic transfer of mutual ene=
rgy and vibration between us and our tech.<BR>
 <BR>
yes it is communi=
ng in a way, but as far as our minds telepathically sending subliminal<BR>
=
messages through the box. I do not believe that to be so. I will not comple=
tely disregard the possibility,<BR>
I will consider it with an open mind. A=
s the research and our knowledge of the communication process<BR>
evolves t=
hrough learning from our spirit friends, I believe that eventually all ques=
tions will be answered.<BR>
 <BR>
Bruce<BR><BR><BR>
